discourage.translation[0].definitions[0]: to persuade someone not to do something, especially by making it seem difficult or bad
My father is a lawyer, and he discouraged me from entering the field.
discourage.translation[0].definitions[1]: to make someone less confident or less willing to do something
You should not let one failure discourage you.
discourage.translation[0].definitions[2]: to make something less likely to happen
Aspirin may discourage tumour growth in some types of cancer.
